content: diamonds in the rough a handsome scarf in tunisian crochet designed by michael snow diamonds in the rough a handsome scarf in tunusian crochet designed by michael snow the subtle textured diamond pattern of this crocheted scarf works to complement any outfit rather than compete with it alternately worked in simple and purl tunisian stitches the pattern works up quickly for last-minute gifts the scarf was designed with the unique look and feel of stansborough wool in mind but for a softer elegance i would suggest a berroco® ultra alpaca light double knit weight yarn finished size 5½ x 56¼ without fringe materials yarn stansborough fibres or any dk weight yarn 3 -
